content: चरुः [चर् उन्] {@--1@} An oblation of rice or barley boiled for presentation to the gods and the manes: अनवस्रावी निरुष्मपक्व आंदनश्चरुरिति याज्ञिकाः (It is often boiled in milk and is called पयश्चरु; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>R. 10. 51</ls>, <ls n="R. 10.">54</ls>, <ls n="R. 10.">56</ls>; or sprinkled over with butter or ghee.) {@--2@} A kind of vessel in which an oblation is prepared. {@--3@} A cloud.
